Welcome to Musical Mafia!

The Rules (mostly taken from other moderators)
> Follow the site rules
> Play to your win condition.
> Do not communicate with players outside the game unless your role permits it. Do not communicate about ongoing games in this game. I WILL BE STRICT ABOUT THIS RULE.
> Do not attempt to encrypt or otherwise hide information. Keep your font sizes above Tiny.
> Do not quote any information given to you by the moderator. Please paraphrase.
> If there is an error or concern, please post with "@Mod" in bold in the game or send me a PM. Please end any and all PMs about the game with "Mini Normal XXXX" so I can respond to you with ease.
> Players may Bah post, as long as they do not add anything that may interfere with the game.
> The color #0000FF is MINE. Do not use it. I will use #FF00FF for private topics.
> Do not use proven randomness, like the dice tags.
> I have the right to add any rules necessary.
> If you state you have broken a rule, I will treat it the same as if I had found out on my own.
Gameplay
> Day Phases will be 14 real life days. Night Phases will be 72 hours (3 days). Extensions will be granted in extreme cases.
> Inactivity for >48 hours will result in a prod. Players will have 24 hours to respond to the prod before being replaced. 3 prods with a lack of improvement will result in force replacement.
> Please post in bold that you will be V/LA or PM me. If someone is V/LA for the length of a Night I reserve the right to replace them.
>Please use voting tags or bolded text to vote, on a separate line.

I am not a reviewer, but I would somewhat disagree. Jailkeeper and cop (even if odd night) are VERY strong roles, and scum has no power to block their actions.
